text: |Topic area|Policies|Key monitoring indicator| |||| |Homes for the community|HF1 - Meeting housing needs|Net additional homes in the monitoring year and previous years by housing type and tenure| ||HF2 - Affordable housing and housing mix|Percentage of new homes that are affordable, measured by unit and habitable room (approved applications)| |||Percentage of new homes that are affordable, measured by unit and habitable room (delivered)| ||HF5 - Gypsy and Traveller accommodation|Number of Gypsy and Traveller pitches| ||HF9 - Housing standards and quality|Delivery of wheelchair accessible/ adaptable homes across all housing types| |Clean and green future 540|CG2 - Low energy buildings|Number of developments meeting assured performance targets| ||CG3 - Low carbon energy and heating|Quantity of PV panels installed| |||Number of developments contributing total energy use and renewable energy generation figures|
